metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1271 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
arbitrary file overwrite with crafted file names

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-1271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gzip - 1.10-4ubuntu1.1
gzip-win32 - 1.10-4ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

liblzma5 - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1
xz-utils - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1
xzdec - 5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gzip package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10-4ubuntu1.1').
xz-utils package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.5-2ubuntu0.1').
